0: if [ $(curl -s https://am.i.mullvad.net/ip) = '${SECRET_EXT_GATEWAY_IP}' ]; then exit 0; else exit $?; fi

/hr/ghcr.io-grafana-operator-helm-charts.title: loki helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-grafana-operator-helm-charts.name: loki
/hr/ghcr.io-grafana-operator-helm-charts.doc: Loki is a log aggregation system that aggregates logs from various sources, such as Kubernetes, and makes them available for search and analysis. It uses a label-based approach to categorize logs, making it easy to query and retrieve relevant logs. The system is designed to be horizontally scalable, highly available, and multi-tenant, making it suitable for use in a variety of environments, including home labs.

0:
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m
" "[2/8] Connect to repo ..."          && (kopia repo connect b2 --bucket=$KOPIA_REPO --prefix=$KOPIA_PREFIX/ --password=$KOPIA_PASSWORD --override-hostname=cluster --override-username=root || (echo "Creating Repo" && kopia repo create b2 --bucket=$KOPIA_REPO --prefix=$KOPIA_PREFIX/ --password=$KOPIA_PASSWORD --override-hostname=cluster --override-username=root))
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m
" "[3/8] Set policies ..."             && kopia policy set b2://$KOPIA_REPO/$KOPIA_PREFIX/ --compression=zstd --keep-latest 14 --keep-hourly 0 --keep-daily 7 --keep-weekly 2 --keep-monthly 0 --keep-annual 0
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m
" "[05/10] Snapshot $KOPIA_PREFIX ..." && kopia snap create /data/
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m
" "[5/8] List snapshots ..."           && kopia snap list
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m
" "[6/8] Show stats ..."               && kopia content stats
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m
" "[7/8] Show maintenance info ..."    && kopia maintenance info
printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m
" "[8/8] Disconnect from repo ..."     && kopia repo disconnect

mqtt:
  host: emqx
  topic_prefix: frigate
  user: ${SECRET_FRIGATE_MQTT_USER}
  password: ${SECRET_FRIGATE_MQTT_PASSWORD}
database:
  path: /data/frigate.db
detectors:
  coral:
    type: edgetpu
    device: pci
objects:
  track:
  - person
  - dog
  filters:
    person:
      min_area: 2500
      max_area: 100000
      threshold: 0.7
    dog:
      min_area: 1000
      max_area: 10000
      threshold: 0.7
ffmpeg:
  hwaccel_args:
  - -hwaccel
  - vaapi
  - -hwaccel_device
  - /dev/dri/renderD128
  - -hwaccel_output_format
  - yuv420p
  # Enable audio on recordings...
  # might cause issues on recording playback
  output_args:
    record: -f segment -segment_time 10 -segment_format mp4 -reset_timestamps 1 -strftime 1 -c:v copy -c:a aac
cameras:
  # --
  doorbell:
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Sub Stream
      # - path: rtsp://admin:${SECRET_DOORBELL_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_DOORBELL_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
      #   roles:
      #   - detect
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://admin:${SECRET_DOORBELL_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_DOORBELL_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        - record
    detect:
      width: 720
      height: 576
      fps: 15
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    rtmp:
      enabled: True
    
  front_door:
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: false
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        # - rtmp
        # - detect
        - record
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        # - record
        # - clips
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 15
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
          - car
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: True

  garage:
    rtmp:
      enabled: false
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_GARAGE_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_GARAGE_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        # - rtmp
        # - detect
        - record
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_GARAGE_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_GARAGE_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        # - record
        # - clips
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 30
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
          - car
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: True

kubectl get pods \
  --all-namespaces \
  -o go-template \
  --template='{{range .items}}{{printf "%s %s %s\n" .metadata.namespace .metadata.name .status.message}}{{end}}' \
  | grep "Pod was terminated in response to imminent node shutdown." \
  | awk '{print $1, $2}' \
  | xargs -r -n2 kubectl delete pod -n || true

mkdir -p /data/snapshots
export VAULT_TOKEN=$(vault write -format=json auth/approle/login role_id=$APPROLE_ROLE_ID secret_id=$APPROLE_SECRET_ID | awk -F'"' '/client_token/{print $4}')
vault operator raft snapshot save /data/snapshots/vault-raft.snap
ls -l /data/snapshots

until [ -f /data/snapshots/vault-raft.snap ]; do sleep 5; done
gcloud auth activate-service-account --key-file=/data/credentials/credentials.json
gsutil cp /data/snapshots/vault-raft.snap gs://$BUCKET_NAME/vault_raft_$(date +"%Y%m%d_%H%M%S").snap
